texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Details of road and bridge closures for Prudential RideLondon 2019."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
This pages lists the roads and bridges that are closed for Prudential RideLondon 2019.
See our advice on getting around London over the weekend ofÂ the events.
Check out routes (with maps) on the Prudential RideLondon website .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Traffic impact maps for Saturday and Sunday"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Roads closed from Friday to Monday morning"}
These roads are closed from Friday 2 August until 06:00 on Monday 5 August:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Horse Guards Road","The Mall (between Horse Guards Road and Queens Gardens)","Marlborough Road"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"From 07:30 on Saturday 3 August until 20:00 on Sunday 4 August"}
These roads are closed all day on Saturday 3 August. They all re-open at 18:00.
